contents.text: Our worldwide cover looks at Joe Biden’s plan to remake America’s economy. It is confused and selfish, but could help save the planet.

Leader: Joe Biden’s effort to remake the economy is ambitious, risky—and selfishBriefing: America’s government is spending lavishly to revive manufacturingUnited States: America needs a new environmentalism
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.
